books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: A sequel told from Christian's point of view.
books.name: GREY

books.author: by Daniel Silva
books.description: Gabriel Allon, an art restorer and occasional spy for the Israeli secret service, helps British intelligence track down the killer of a beautiful former member of the royal family.
books.name: THE ENGLISH SPY

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Robyn Carr
books.description: After a man makes a spectacle of himself at his sister's wedding, will he be able to make amends?
books.name: A NEW HOPE

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II; the winner of the 2015 Pulitzer Prize.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Andy Weir
books.description: Abandoned by his crew, an astronaut embarks on a dogged quest to stay alive.
books.name: THE MARTIAN

books.author: by Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: Two friends on Nantucket must deal with damaging gossip about themselves and their husbands.
books.name: THE RUMOR

books.author: by Kristen Ashley
books.description: A struggling single mom wants to reconnect with her high school sweetheart, now a biker. Will she fit in with the Chaos Motorcycle Club?
books.name: RIDE STEADY

books.author: by Brad Taylor
books.description: In the eighth Pike Logan thriller, Logan and the Taskforce must defeat an unanticipated threat from ISIS.
books.name: THE INSIDER THREAT

books.author: by James Patterson and Howard Roughan
books.description: An attorney discovers a shocking secret that must be kept out of the wrong hands.
books.name: TRUTH OR DIE

books.author: by Susan Mallery
books.description: A cattle drive and a forbidden kiss bring mismatched lovers together.
books.name: KISS ME

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Jessica Knoll
books.description: The life of a successful magazine writer is shaken when secrets from her past are revealed in a documentary.
books.name: LUCKIEST GIRL ALIVE

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman who was spared when her mother and sisters were murdered begins to reinvestigate the case against her imprisoned brother.
books.name: DARK PLACES

books.author: by Fern Michaels
books.description: A presidential adviser meets his match when he abuses a member of the Sisterhood.
books.name: IN PLAIN SIGHT
